Text: e denna mycket bättre än vanliga surreal64? har du märkt skillnad? hörde att de va annat gui?

Ska seeda denna då jag kommer hem för Piratebay var grymt slött igår kväll...

Provade en hel del spel från StonerMan´s release *tackar* och fann att de flesta spelen funkar bra. I denna har du 3st emulatorer i en. Bra va? =)

Much better even if it's only beta.

You need to run it from HD to get these features:

1. Remembers the last emu you used per game.
2. Controller settings saved per game.

Other then that you get better graphics and sound.
Does anyone know how to get Zelda: Majoras Mask to work on this emulator? If it's even possible.... =(

Yes I play it a lot. Use 1964 or the first emulator on the menu. First I thought it didn't work but it takes a while before the intro shows plus the intro is black at the beginning with some mystic sound.

Also some roms can have broken zips so if you can unzip then at least you know there's nothing wrong with the rom.

I finally got it! You can run eather Surreal64 or Beta2 from HD and use StonerMans iso in the DVD-drive.

Edit surreal.ini
Change rom path to a:...->where StonerMan put the roms folder, eg a:roms .

If you gonna compile a new iso then do NOT put roms on the root directory. It will NOT work. You must put them in a folder.

If you run Surreal64 then the folder must be named "roms".

If you run Beta 2 then the folder can be named anything.

Hope this helped.
